amendment.description: At the end of subtitle E of title X, insert the following: SEC. 10__. UNITED STATES MUNITIONS LIST. The President may not remove from the United States Munitions List any item that was included in category I, II, or III of the United States Munitions List, as in effect on August 31, 2017.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 to prohibit the President from removing items from Categories I through III of the United States Munitions List, including firearms, close assault weapons and combat shotguns, guns and armament, and ammunition and ordnance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Torres (CA) amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 205 (Roll no. 442).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Torres (CA) amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 205 (Roll no. 442).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mrs. Torres (CA).
